comment.author: 11418107@N02
comment._content: Musicians: Gabriel Lapierre played piano and Jan Kubelik violin; both men accompanied opera singer Nellie Melba on tour and on recordings. en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Jan_Kubel%C3%ADk

comment.author: 23103743@N05
comment._content: According to NYT of February 06, 1913, query.nytimes.com/gst/abstract.html?res=9B0DE1D81E3AE633A... they were on an American tour planned to end in April 1914. Perhaps, given the time period the Bain collectoin seems to have reached for Flickr uploading, this picture (probably on a ship) marks the end of the tour and the return to Europe.
